programme.title: The Rick Mercer Report
programme.desc: (S15EP19) Tonight Rick joins Indian dance troupe Maritime Bhangra in Halifax and then he's in North Bay, Ontario with the Nipissing Trackers who teach special needs children how to ski.

programme.title: The Rick Mercer Report
programme.desc: (S15EP20) Rick is in North Bay, ON. learning how to fly a helicopter and then he checks out an innovative engineering firm in Guelph, ON where buildings undergo rigorous testing in a wind tunnel.

programme.title: The Rick Mercer Report
programme.desc: (S14EP01) Rick goes to Vancouver's Stanley Park to join Mermaids International, which means wearing a tail and learning how to swim like a merman. Next he turns up in Kitchener-Waterloo, Ontario where he flies a tiny two-person open-air gyroplane.

programme.title: The Rick Mercer Report
programme.desc: (S14EP02) Rick is in St. John's, NFLD where he helps feed and care for seals housed at Memorial University's Ocean Sciences Centre and then he heads to Toronto for North America's largest Polish festival where he learns traditional dances and samples the food.

programme.title: The Rick Mercer Report
programme.desc: (S14EP03) Tonight Rick goes to Haida Gwaii in British Columbia and tours lush Gwaii Haanas National Park where he checks out ancient totem pole ruins, tries his hand at traditional fishing techniques and samples Haida cuisine.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: (S24EP11) Jules Hudson is property shopping in Cambridgeshire with young newlyweds who have £800k and want to escape London in favour of some space and serenity in the country.
